<tr> <td id="dcterms:description" border="1px" colspan="2"> <h3>*Term:* dcterms:description </h3></td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px"> *Normative URI:* </td> <td border="1px"> http://purl.org/dc/terms/description </td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px">*Label:* </td> <td border="1px"> Description </td> </tr> <tr><td/> <td border="1px"> *Layer:* Core - *Required:* No — *Repeatable: * No</td> </tr> <tr> <td border="1px">*Definition:* </td> <td border="1px">Description of collection or individual resource, containing the Who, What, When, Where and Why as free-form text. This normative document is silent on the nature of formatting in the text.
